fields.name: EventTriggerConfig
fields.description: Trigger configuration of an event driven job.

fields.name: ManualTriggerConfig
fields.description: Manual trigger configuration for a single execution job. Properties replicaCompletionCount and parallelism would be set to 1 by default

fields.name: Registries
fields.description: Collection of private container registry credentials used by a Container apps job

fields.name: ReplicaRetryLimit
fields.description: Maximum number of retries before failing the job.

fields.name: ReplicaTimeout
fields.description: Maximum number of seconds a replica is allowed to run.

fields.name: ScheduleTriggerConfig
fields.description: Cron formatted repeating trigger schedule ("* * * * *") for cronjobs. Properties completions and parallelism would be set to 1 by default

fields.name: Secrets
fields.description: Collection of secrets used by a Container Apps Job
